contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = {{raise|0.2em|Yanqing County}} |native_name = {{lower|0.1em|{{nobold|{{lang|zh-cn|延庆县}}}}}} |postal_code = 102100 |postal_code_type = [[Postal code of China|Postal code]] |settlement_type = [[County (People's Republic of China)|County]] |image_skyline = Guyaju ruins, Yanqing county, Beijing.JPG |imagesize = 250px |iamge_caption = The Guyaju Ruins, showing ancient cave dwellings, are located in Yanqing County. |image_map = Yanqing.png |map_caption = Location of Yanqing County in Beijing |mapsize = 250px |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = People's Republic of China |subdivision_type1 = [[Direct-controlled municipalities of the People's Republic of China|Municipality]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Beijing]] |area_code = 0010 |area_total_km2 = 1992 |population = |population_as_of = 2000 |population_density_km2 = auto |population_total = 275433 |latNS = |latd = |latm = |lats = |longEW = |longd = |longm = |longs = |elevation_ft = |elevation_m = |timezone = [[China Standard Time|China Standard]] |utc_offset = +8 |website = http://www.bjyq.gov.cn/ }} '''Yanqing County''' ({{zh|s=延庆县 |t=延慶縣 |p=Yánqìng Xiàn}}) is a subdivision of the municipality of [[Beijing]] located northwest of the city proper of Beijing. The county consists of 11 towns and 4 rural townships. ==Overview== The [[Jingbao Railway]], [[Dazhen Railway]], and [[China National Highway 110]] pass through the county. The county has an area of {{convert|1992|km2|abbr=on}} and a population of 275,433 (2000 Census). The county contains many ancient tombs and caves, as well as the popular [[Badaling]] section of the [[Great Wall of China|Great Wall]]. The urban area of Yanqing (87,891 in township) has an area of {{convert|9.8|km2|abbr=on}} and an estimated population of 100,000.[http://harrysworldatlas.blogspot.com/2007/02/china-cn-beijing-metropolitan-province.html] ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} {{Beijing}} {{Coord|40.464521|N|115.980185|E|source:dewiki_region:CN-11_type:adm3rd|format=dms|display=title}} [[Category:Administrative divisions of Beijing]] {{Beijing-geo-stub}}
